title: Diminishing returns means marginal costs rise

content.prompt: Assume that a firm uses only one variable input. If a firm is experiencing diminishing returns, which of the following is true as more of the variable input is used?

choices.label: Marginal cost will decrease at a constant rate.
Marginal cost will decrease at a diminishing rate.
Marginal product will increase at a constant rate.
Marginal product will increase at a diminishing rate.
